item.title: Publish to Maven Central via Sonatype with SBT
item.description: First, create an account on the Sonatype JIRA, unless you have one. For the new group ID, create a ticket using the form under this URI. Once requested, wait for the ticket to go into Resolved state. When this happens, you can publish your project to Sonatype. To do so, configure your SBT project.
